home.description: I'm a young developer with two years' actual programming experience. Passionate about manga, video games, sports and development in Java and TypeScript, I enjoy taking on technical challenges and continuously improving my skills. Motivated and rigorous, I'm always ready to learn new technologies and collaborate effectively in a team to complete innovative projects. My goal is to design high-performance, optimized solutions while contributing to a dynamic and stimulating work environment.

stack.title: KNOW WHO I AM
stack.description: I'm a passionate Full Stack Web Developer with experience in JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, and many other modern technologies.

projects.title: MY RECENT WORKS
projects.description: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.
